clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop

welcome_desc: We're excited to have you. Let's take a quick tour to show you around.
tour_step1_desc: Use the 'Search' tab to discover hundreds of courses on any topic.
tour_step2_desc: MATHIAS is here to answer your questions and help you learn faster.
tour_step3_desc: Find all your official certificates here once you complete a course.
course_complete_desc: You have successfully completed the course:
launchOffer: Launch Offer: All courses at -50% for 48h! ðŸ”¥
step2_rejectionReason: Step 2: Choose a reason for rejection
rejectionTemplateQuality: Hello, thank you for your interest. Unfortunately, the quality of the video/audio does not meet our standards. Please try again with better equipment.
rejectionTemplateTopic: Hello, thank you for your application. The proposed topic does not currently align with our users' demand. We encourage you to propose another course.
rejectionTemplateIncomplete: Hello, your application is incomplete. Please provide all the required information (social links, video, etc.) to be considered.
rejectionTemplateGeneric: Hello, after careful review, we regret to inform you that your application was not successful at this time. We encourage you to reapply in the future.
acceptanceTemplate: Welcome to FormaAfrique! Your instructor account has been approved. You can now start creating your courses. We look forward to your contributions!
applicationApprovedMessage: The instructor can now create courses.
applicationRejectedMessage: The user has been reverted to a student role.
applicationUpdateError: Could not update the application status.
adminNotConnected: Admin user is not connected. Please log in again.
deleteErrorMessage: An unknown error occurred while deleting the user.
editRoleDescription: Changing the role will alter the user's permissions across the platform.
deleteUserConfirmationMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user account for {{name}}.
allRegisteredUsers: All registered users on the platform.
name: Name
settings_desc: Manage the general configuration of the platform.
commission_desc: The percentage taken by the platform on each sale.
featured_course_desc: The ID of the course to feature on the homepage.
maintenance_desc: Redirect all non-admin traffic to a maintenance page.
allow_applications_desc: Enable or disable the 'Become an Instructor' form.
settings_saved_desc: The platform settings have been successfully updated.
transactionsDescription: View the history of all transactions on the platform.
transactionsSearchDescription: Search transactions by user name, email, or transaction ID.

noTransactionsYet: No transactions have been recorded yet.
moderationDescription: Review and approve content submitted by instructors.
pendingCoursesDescription: Courses awaiting approval to be published.
courseApprovedMessage: The course is now live and visible to all students.
marketingDescription: Create promo codes and platform-wide announcements.
mktExamples: Use the AI to create promo codes or write announcements. Ex: 'Create a 20% discount for Easter' or 'Write a banner for a new AI course'.
aiRequestError: The AI could not process your request.
promoUpdateError: Could not update the promo code.
promoLoadError: Could not load promo codes. A Firestore index might be missing.
noPromoCodes: No promo codes have been created yet.
payoutsManagementDescription: Manage and validate instructor payout requests.
payoutMarkedAs: The payout has been marked as {{status}}.
supportDescription: Respond to student and instructor support tickets.
